data.name: Kitty Pryde
data.description: The heart of the X-Men, Kitty Pryde uses her power to phase through solid matter and her dragon pet, Lockheed, to disrupt enemies and protect allies.

starItems.name: Kitty Pryde
starItems.description: The heart of the X-Men, Kitty Pryde uses her power to phase through solid matter and her dragon pet, Lockheed, to disrupt enemies and protect allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

If Colossus is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

If Colossus is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

If Colossus is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

If Colossus is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

If Colossus is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

If Colossus is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to a random Colossus ally and another <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally with the least Speed Bar that does not have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to a random Colossus ally and another <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally with the least Speed Bar that does not have <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

If Colossus is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack.

Gain <color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on all enemies. 

Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on all enemies. 

Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on all enemies. 

Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on all enemies. 

Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on all enemies.

Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Heal self and the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on all enemies.

Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Heal self and the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured ally

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Flip <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on all enemies.

Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

Heal self and the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured ally.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Heal self and the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Heal self and the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured ally

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Heal self and the most injured ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured ally.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally or self.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Enemy Turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally or self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge Chance.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge Chance
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

2.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally or self.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Enemy Turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally or self.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
On enemy miss or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally dodge, heal the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally or self.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Enemy Turn, <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally or self.

On enemy miss or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally dodge, heal the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self

4.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Enemy Turn, <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally or self.

On enemy miss or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally dodge, heal the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Dodge Chance.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, always apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Enemy Turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally or self

5.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies or self.

On Enemy Turn:
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color> and <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally or self.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to the most injured <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> ally or self.

On enemy miss or <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally dodge, heal the most injured <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Dodge Chance.
